text:
e="preserve">Henry Joseph Kalis (March 2, 1937 – September 12, 2018) was an American politician. He was born in Easton, Minnesota. He was a member of the Minnesota House of Representatives from 1975 to 2003. He was a member of the Minnesota Democratic–Farmer–Labor Party.
Kalis died on September 12, 2018, in Albert Lea, Minnesota from emphysema, aged 81.
